snippet.title: Who Am I? | THE EVENT | Indie Horror Game Demo
snippet.description:
New PC Gameplay. Full Demo Walkthrough. After waking up inside an asylum, I realize that I don't remember who I am or how I got there...

►Follow me on Facebook - http://on.fb.me/1u0sffi
►Follow me on Twitter - http://Twitter.com/CjuGames
►Join me on Discord - https://discord.gg/n657S3k
►Support me on Patreon - https://Patreon.com/CjuGames

►More Info - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2444700

►About the Game - 
The Event is a first-person psychological horror game featuring haunting gameplay and a rich narrative.

You wake up in an asylum with no memory of who you are or how you got there.

With the help of clues, notes and testimonies, will you be able to piece together the story of what happened to you and the people who were there the day it all happened?

Wander in the dark and find the truth.

Features:
-Immersive Graphics and Sound Design: An amazing graphics quality and an immersive sound design will give the player a detailed and terrifying place to explore.
-A smart traveler: The protagonist will be your ally in solving the story by accompanying the player with his personality and his thoughts that can be consulted by interacting and finding items in the asylum.
-Full Psychological Horror Experience: The player will not be able to use any weapon the only option is to run or hide.
-Event Reconstruction: Nothing will be revealed directly to the player. The protagonist will have to find out the truth about what happened by exploring the corners of the asylum.
-Unpredictable Situations: The player will be inadvertently surprised by the antagonists and by the terrifying situations that populates the asylum.

#indiegames #theevent #horrorgames

* * * * * * * * * * * * * 
►Indie Game Playlist - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3AISiWybyWfQkzIBrfTjuyUfLMNG44_Y
